note: I have been creating gardening experiences for incarcerated folks in New Mexico. Last year, incarcerated people, both adolescents and adults in various residential facilities established multiple gardens. Spent some time in a village in Kenya teaching with the Peace Corps. Profile pic is taken at the hallowed grounds of Azovstal, where the last stand of the defenders of Mariupol, took place. A ray of light shines down into a ruined factory by a lone warrior #SlavaUkraini #Palestine
